caption: The low quality recording features a percussive shoe tapping over hip hop beat playing in the background. The beat consists of shimmering shakers, hard 808 bass and punchy snare. At one point the shoe tapper gets a little bit sloppy. It sounds a bit muffled, boomy and reverberant.
